DOC.brief_summary: This study is an online survey asking for invasive instrumention in trauma patients of an emergency department
DOC.brief_title: INVITE Study: Invasive Instrumentation in Trauma Patients in the Shock Room
DOC.detailed_description: The INVITE study is an online survey for medical doctors asking for invasive instrumention (e.g., arterial line, entral venous line, etc.) in trauma patients of an emergency department
DOC.criteria: Patients with multiple trauma treated in the emrgency department
